Samuel Ajayi Crowther (ihe dị ka n'afọ  na 31 Disemba 1891), bụ  ọkà mmụta asụsụ Yoruba, ụkọchukwu, na bishọp Anglican Africa mbụ nke West Africa

A mụrụ ya na Osogun (n'ihe bụ Ado-Awaye, Oyo State, Nigeria ugbua), ndị na-awakpo ohu jidere ya na ezinaụlọ ya mgbe ọ dị ihe dị ka afọ iri na abụọ. Nke a mere n'oge agha obodo Yoruba, nke e ji agha Owu nke 1821 – 1829 wee mara, ebe a chụpụrụ obodo ya Osogun
E mechara regharịa Ajayi nye ndị na-ere ahịa ohu Portuguese, ebe etinyere ya n'ụgbọ ka e buru ya gaa New World site na Atlantic.
A tọhapụrụ Crowther n'ohu n'ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri dị n'ụsọ oké osimiri site n'aka Royal Navy's West Africa Squadron, nke na-eme ka mmachibido iwu Britain megide ahịa ohu Atlantic
A kpọghachiri ndị a tọhapụrụ na Sierra Leone.
